fields.name: BlockedTransformers
fields.description: These transformers shall not be used in featurization.

fields.name: ColumnNameAndTypes
fields.description: Dictionary of column name and its type (int, float, string, datetime etc).

fields.name: DatasetLanguage
fields.description: Dataset language, useful for the text data.

fields.name: EnableDnnFeaturization
fields.description: Determines whether to use Dnn based featurizers for data featurization.

fields.name: Mode
fields.description:
Featurization mode - User can keep the default 'Auto' mode and AutoML will take care of necessary transformation of the data in featurization phase.
If 'Off' is selected then no featurization is done.
If 'Custom' is selected then user can specify additional inputs to customize how featurization is done.

fields.name: TransformerParams
fields.description: User can specify additional transformers to be used along with the columns to which it would be applied and parameters for the transformer constructor.
